tweets.text: A very geeky question, but how often are SIC codes updated? See Netflix description below. https://t.co/RGYn4Oxk41

Missed this news last week with everything else going on, but @EDGAR_Online, the OG of SEC filings, was sold last week, undoubtedly for a lot less than RR Donnelly paid for them a decade ago. https://t.co/FTlkwofX4o
